statements.statement: SELECT TopicLabelRefId,TopicNo,TopicLabelNo FROM SWfsTopicLabelRef WHERE TopicLabelRefId=@TopicLabelRefId
SELECT OrderNo,SaleUserName FROM WfsOrderAssist WHERE OrderNo=@OrderNo
SELECT ImgId,SubjectNo,ImageURL,Type FROM SWfsSubjectImageLibrary WHERE ImgId=@ImgId
SELECT SubjectBrandRefId,SubjectNo,BrandNo FROM SWfsSubjectBrandRef WHERE SubjectBrandRefId=@SubjectBrandRefId
SELECT ForgetPasswordId,UserId,DateCreate FROM WfsForgetPassword WHERE ForgetPasswordId=@ForgetPasswordId
SELECT ID,TemplateID,Type,FileName,PicNo FROM SWfsMeetingTemplatePicInfo WHERE ID=@ID
SELECT UserId,ItemXmlText,DateAdd FROM SWfsPromotionShoppingCart WHERE UserId=@UserId
SELECT SubjectChannelRefId,SubjectNo,ChannelNo FROM SWfsSubjectChannelRef WHERE SubjectChannelRefId=@SubjectChannelRefId
SELECT RoleResourceRefNo,ResourceNo,RoleNo FROM WfsRoleResourceRef WHERE RoleResourceRefNo=@RoleResourceRefNo
SELECT VerifyCodeId,VerifyCode,CreateTime FROM WfsVerifyCode WHERE VerifyCodeId=@VerifyCodeId
SELECT ID,MeetingID,Title,KeyWords,Description FROM SWfsMeetingMetaInfo WHERE ID=@ID
SELECT UserTicketRef,UserId,CashTicketNo FROM WfsUserTicketRef WHERE UserTicketRef=@UserTicketRef
SELECT StyleNo,StyleName,Status,Sort,DateCreate FROM SWfsStyle WHERE StyleNo=@StyleNo
SELECT PriceTypeId,PriceTag,PriceType,IsDelete FROM SWfsNewSubjectPriceType WHERE PriceTypeId=@PriceTypeId
SELECT Id,SubjectNo,Type,ChannelNo FROM SWfsSubjectLableType WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT Id,SearchUrl,Direction,CreateDate,UserId FROM SWfsSortHistory WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT Id,BrandNo,NewShelfAmount,DateShelf FROM SWfsNewBrandProductManage WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT NavPublishID,MeetingID,NavHtml,DateCreate FROM SWfsMeetingNavigationPublish WHERE NavPublishID=@NavPublishID
SELECT CDKUserId,CDKNo,UserId,DateCreate FROM SWfsCDKUserRef WHERE CDKUserId=@CDKUserId
SELECT OrderTicketNo,OrderNo,TicketNo FROM SWfsOrderDiscountTicketRef WHERE OrderTicketNo=@OrderTicketNo
SELECT OrderTicketNo,OrderNo,CashTicketNo FROM WfsOrderTicket WHERE OrderTicketNo=@OrderTicketNo
SELECT RoleNo,RoleName,RoleDescription,Status FROM WfsRole WHERE RoleNo=@RoleNo
SELECT KeyID,TypeID,ObjectNo,ObjectAlias,Gender FROM SWfsCategoryBrandAlias WHERE KeyID=@KeyID
SELECT UserId,Credits,TotalCredits FROM SWfsUserCredits WHERE UserId=@UserId
SELECT Id,SubjectNo,SordNo FROM SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT OperatorRoleRefNo,UserName,RoleNo FROM WfsMarketOperatorRoleRef WHERE OperatorRoleRefNo=@OperatorRoleRefNo
SELECT TradeProductNo,TradeProductXmtText FROM WfsTradeProduct WHERE TradeProductNo=@TradeProductNo
SELECT PK,UserId,InsertTime FROM Blacklist WHERE PK=@PK
SELECT OperatorRoleRefNo,UserName,RoleNo FROM WfsOperatorRoleRef WHERE OperatorRoleRefNo=@OperatorRoleRefNo
SELECT UserId,GroupNo FROM SWfsUserGroupRef WHERE UserId=@UserId
SELECT RoleResourceRefNo,ResourceNo,RoleNo FROM WfsMarketRoleResourceRef WHERE RoleResourceRefNo=@RoleResourceRefNo
SELECT UserId,Event,Friend,Survey,News FROM SWfsUserNoticeRef WHERE UserId=@UserId
SELECT PayTypeId,PayTypeName,PayTypeValue FROM WfsPayType WHERE PayTypeId=@PayTypeId
SELECT GroupNo,SubjectNo FROM SWfsSubjectGroupRef WHERE SubjectNo=@SubjectNo
SELECT Id,ChannelNo,SordNo FROM SWfsChannelSordRef WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT CollectionId,UserId,ProductNo,DateCreate FROM WfsCollection WHERE CollectionId=@CollectionId
SELECT RoleNo,RoleName FROM WfsMarketRole WHERE RoleNo=@RoleNo
SELECT ActivityTypeId,ActivityTypeName FROM SWfsVActivityType WHERE ActivityTypeId=@ActivityTypeId
SELECT KeyID,CategoryNo,PictureManageId FROM SWfsCategoryPicRef WHERE KeyID=@KeyID
SELECT RefID,SubjectNo,BDSubjectNo FROM SWfsBDSubjectSubjectRef WHERE RefID=@RefID
SELECT Id,AppType,UserId,Message,DateCreate FROM SwfsLpMessage WHERE Id=@Id
SELECT ChannelID,ChannelNO,Status,CreateDate FROM SWfsSpChannel WHERE ChannelID=@ChannelID
SELECT UserId,NoticeState FROM SWfsNoticeState WHERE UserId=@UserId
SELECT OrderNo,OrderNoSeq,OrderNoFull FROM WfsOrderPayExt WHERE OrderNo=@OrderNo
SELECT ShoppingCartId,SkuCount,ItemXmlText FROM WfsOcsShoppingCart WHERE ShoppingCartId=@ShoppingCartId
SELECT ID,OrderID,NewOrderID,CreateDate FROM WfsOrderBankFQPay WHERE ID=@ID
